question: 81. Which of the following would you use to interact with a CloudFront distribution?
options: A. CloudFormation
C. The AWS REST APIs
B. The AWS CLI
D. Any of these
answers: D. Any of these

question: 82. Which of the following are origin sources usable with a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
options: B. DynamoDB
D. An Oracle RDS instance
C. AWS Shield
A. An ALB
answers: C. AWS Shield
A. An ALB

question: 83. Which of the following are origin sources usable with a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
options: C. S3 buckets
A. DynamoDB
D. RedShift
B. A fleet of EC2 instances
answers: C. S3 buckets
B. A fleet of EC2 instances

question: 84. Which of the following are origin sources usable with a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
options: C. Aurora on RDS
A. Lambda@Edge
D. ElastiCache instances
B. A static website on S3
answers: A. Lambda@Edge
B. A static website on S3

question: 85. Which of the following two are advantages of using a CloudFront distribution? (Choose two.)
options: C. Integration with AWS managed services
A. Performance
D. Disaster recovery
B. Fault tolerance
answers: C. Integration with AWS managed services
A. Performance

question: 86. How does CloudFront increase the security of content at the edge? (Choose two.)
options: D. Automatic deployment of AWS Shield
B. Integration with AWS WAF (if configured)
A. Required HTTPS at all edge locations
C. Automatic client keys encrypted with KMS
answers: D. Automatic deployment of AWS Shield
B. Integration with AWS WAF (if configured)

question: 87. Choose the true statements about edge locations. (Choose two.)
options: C. There are fewer edge locations than availability zones.
B. There are more edge locations than regions.
A. There are fewer edge locations than regions.
D. There are more edge locations than availability zones.
answers: D. There are more edge locations than availability zones.
B. There are more edge locations than regions.

question: 88. Which of the following can you do with CloudFront? (Choose two.)
options: D. Provide storage for static files that are frequently accessed.
B. Quickly create websites that are dynamic and low latency.
A. Quickly deploy a global network for your content without contracts or startup requirements.
C. Distribute content with low latency and high data transfer rates.
answers: C. Distribute content with low latency and high data transfer rates.
A. Quickly deploy a global network for your content without contracts or startup requirements.

question: 89. Which of the following can be origin servers for CloudFront? (Choose two.)
options: A. S3 buckets
C. RedShift workloads
B. EC2 instances
D. SNS notifications
answers: A. S3 buckets
B. EC2 instances

question: 90. Which domain name should you use to take advantage of CloudFront?
options: B. The domain name registered in CloudFront as the origin for your static and dynamic content
D. The domain name from the AWS console for your CloudFront distribution
A. The domain name registered to your S3 buckets in Route 53
C. The domain name registered in your ALB or ELB pointing to your content
answers: B. The domain name registered in CloudFront as the origin for your static and dynamic content

question: 91. Which of the following might occur when content is requested from a CloudFront edge location? (Choose two.)
options: A. Cached content at the edge location is returned.
C. A request is made to an origin server for the requested content.
B. The request is passed directly to an origin server without CloudFront processing.
D. A redirect is returned to the client.
answers: A. Cached content at the edge location is returned.
C. A request is made to an origin server for the requested content.

question: 92. Which of the following statements about CloudFront are not true? (Choose two.)
options: B. CloudFront maintains persistent connections with origin servers.
C. A request will be routed by CloudFront to the nearest edge location to the origin server, which will serve that request.
A. CloudFront edge locations are geographically distributed across the world.
D. CloudFront can use an RDS instance of PostgreSQL as an origin server.
answers: C. A request will be routed by CloudFront to the nearest edge location to the origin server, which will serve that request.
D. CloudFront can use an RDS instance of PostgreSQL as an origin server.

question: 93. How is data transferred out from a region to a CloudFront edge location charged?
options: A. At normal egress data rates
D. There is no charge.
B. At half the price of normal egress rates
C. At the lowest available rate for the region from which the data originates
answers: D. There is no charge.

question: 94. Which of the following are true about both S3 and CloudFront? (Choose two.)
options: B. They both support encryption of their content.
A. They both store files.
D. They both provide low-latency distribution of content to clients.
C. They both cache files.
answers: B. They both support encryption of their content.
A. They both store files.

question: 95. Which of the following content types can be served by CloudFront? (Choose two.)
options: A. The returned rows from a SQL query
C. A Lambda function
B. The response from a PHP script
D. HTML and CSS
answers: B. The response from a PHP script
D. HTML and CSS

question: 96. Which of the following can be CloudFront origin servers? (Choose two.)
options: C. A MySQL RDS instance
A. A web server hosted on another cloud provider
B. An EC2 instance fleet spread across two regions
D. An SNS topic
answers: A. A web server hosted on another cloud provider
B. An EC2 instance fleet spread across two regions

question: 97. What is an edge location?
options: D. An EC2 instance in a remote region from your primary content
A. A specific node within a worldwide network of data centers that deliver CloudFront content
B. A virtual cloud of caching stations
C. A fleet of EC2 instances managed by AWS
answers: A. A specific node within a worldwide network of data centers that deliver CloudFront content

question: 98. What is a CloudFront distribution?
options: C. The cached content on CloudFront edge locations at any given time
B. A set of origin servers whose content is served by CloudFront via various edge locations
D. The cached content from your account stored on CloudFront edge locations at any given time
A. A worldwide network of data centers
answers: B. A set of origin servers whose content is served by CloudFront via various edge locations

question: 99. How long is content cached at an edge location?
options: C. 12 hours by default, but this value can be changed.
D. 24 hours by default, but this value can be changed.
A. 24 hours
B. 12 hours
answers: D. 24 hours by default, but this value can be changed.

question: 100. What is the shortest expiration period allowed for a CloudFront edge location?
options: D. 1 minute
B. 5 seconds
A. 0 seconds
C. 30 seconds
answers: A. 0 seconds
